column17:
Product Description

ORIFLAME LOVE POTION EAU DE PARFUM 50ML The house of Oriflame offers their first aphrodisiac perfume Love Potion as the embodiment of seduction. Perfect to increase desire and passion and to stimulate game of seduction in hot summer! The fragrance possesses an oriental character and is based on two main ingredients known as aphrodisiacs - ginger and chocolate. Sensuality and sensitivity of the scent is provided by ginger and spices from India. It continues with exotic aromas of slightly sweet cocoa flowers fresh tangerine tender lily and vanilla. The whole tempting and warm composition is rounded up by tonka beans and sandalwood. Accompanying products in this seductive fragrant collection include Gel for intimate moments Love Potion and Massage Oil Love Potion. The first one is a gentle moisturizing gel that helps restore balance to your sensitive areas. It helps you relax. Available as 75 ml. The latter is scented oil ideal for sensual massage with Love Potion. Seductive elixir of ginger cocoa and chocolate flowers awakes your senses and enchants. Available as 250 ml. Colors of this edition are red color of passion and mysterious black.

column17:
Product Description

ORIFLAME FELICITY Felicity is the new perfume from Oriflame a scented exotic fantasy that takes you into the world of Indian Princesses with its oriental fruity notes. The fragrance evokes the grandeur of Indian jewelry and colorful dresses inspired by the flower bazaar at the Lake Dal in Kashmir. The perfumer Christian Vermorel evokes the fascinating and surreal atmosphere of this place in northwestern India filled with flavors of many flowers mixed with the nearby scents of spices and fruits. Vanilla used in this fragrance is supplied by EARF (Eco-Agri Research Foundation) a nonprofit organization that helps Indian farmers. The composition opens with luscious notes of cinnamon lemon peach and plum. Flower bouquet in the heart is made of Indian jasmine freesia orange blossom and lily of the valley laid on the base of vanilla musk sandalwood and benzoin.

column17:
Product Description

ORIFLAME LOVELY GARDEN EAU DE TOILETTE 50ML Oriflame launches Lovely Garden in spring 2012 a new fresh floral scent of sumptuous and mysterious beauty inspired by green gardens. The fragrance is rich with fresh floral green and milky notes which seek to evoke the intimacy and beauty of a secret garden. The composition is created by perfumer Jean Jacques who put fruity aromas of rhubarb and pomegranate combined with green shades at the top. Flowers of red peony and heliotrope are blended with milky notes leading to the warm base comprised of musk sandalwood and vanilla orchid. The shape of the bottle is inspired by the iconic "tea" dresses like those worn by movie stars from the early 20th century. The design and the scent tend to follow retro flair.

column14: Amazon.in: Buy Oriflame Muse Eau De Toilette 50Ml Online at Best Price in India | Amazon Beauty Store
column15: Buy Oriflame Muse Eau De Toilette 50Ml at lowest price in India on Amazon.in. Check out Oriflame Muse Eau De Toilette 50Ml reviews  ratings  features  specifications and browse more Beauty products online at best prices on Amazon.in.
column17:
Product Description

ORIFLAME MUSE Oriflame presents its vision of the world of imagination fantasy and magic with the new spring fragrance Muse. The delicate floral scent is inspired by the world that you may have forgotten along with your childhood - the world ruled by fairies knights elves and unicorns. Muse heroine is a dreamer who is in love with life. She enjoys fabulous nature awaken by the spring lovely flowers and colorful butterflies. In her fantasy world white magic always triumphs over evil and light rules over darkness. Christian Vermorel the creator of the composition found his inspiration in the flowery meadows of Provence and tried to evoke that fresh light and magical spring air. This fragrance is a poetic saga of the spring awakening in all its beauty and glory. Modern gentle lively and delicate it combines green notes with a dewy floral bouquet and warm woods nuances. Fresh green leaves pink pepper and bergamot as top notes lead to the heart of dewy rose violet and lilac bouquet. The gentle base reminiscents of a breeze composed of white musk sandalwood and cedar. The bottle of the fragrance is shaped like a stem flower with petals in full bloom at the top. Both box and bottle are colored in delicate purple the box being decorated with flower graphics

Product Description

ORIFLAME MORE BY DEMI Swedish cosmetics company Oriflame celebrates 45 years of its existence and for the occasion is partnering with the world-famous American Hollywood actress Demi Moore. In collaboration with Demi a new collection of cosmetics jewelry and of course perfume is presented. It is named called More by Demi. More by Demi fragrance is a modern interpretation of the fairy tale characters such as Snow White and Cinderella. It offers sophistication sensuality intensity and indulgence. The composition is signed by perfumer Fabrice Pellegrin. The fragrance contains notes of green mandarin and white peach at the top; white flowers pf Tahitian ylang-ylang and elegant Arabian jasmine in the heart and creamy sandalwood and white lilies at the base.

column17:
Product Description

ORIFLAME DELICACY Delicacy is inspired by the most popular dessert by Christophe Michalak who won the prize Power Flower. This dessert is created as almond cake covered with airy mousse made of red berries shaped like rose petals. The composition is created to transfer sweetness of this tasty dessert. Top notes encompass black currant pink pepper and William's pear. A heart offers scents of rose biscuit with a seductive fruity blend of raspberries and strawberries on a base of vanilla praline and musk. Delicacy was launched in 2011. The nose behind this fragrance is Marie Salamagne.
